title: Flamingo Air's MacDonald Offers 'Mile-High-Club' Flights(Audio)
itunes:title: Flamingo Air's MacDonald Offers 'Mile-High-Club' Flights(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: David MacDonald, CEO of Flamingo Air, on offering romantic "mile-high-club" flights for customers, and their drone training school.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
